name: Vivaio
description:
Welcome to Vivaio, a place to grow your little plants and sell the products of your hard work. Build, plant, water, harvest and sell all you want, without worries!

Our first playable version is now available for free. You can try it and tell us what do you think using Twitter: https://twitter.com/VivaioGame.
You can also comment and vote the next features that will come to the next version of Vivaio using Trello: https://trello.com/b/yylzJIvT/vivaio.

If you find any bug, you can help us by sending a DM to Twitter or an email at: vivaio.gamedev@gmail.com (we'd really appreciate that!).
